localizedText.Button_Tooltip_Activate_MissingSymbolAcc: Activate recipe. You need write access to the 'ActivateRecipe' symbol of the recipe management domain for this
localizedText.Button_Tooltip_Teach_MissingSymbolAccess: Teach recipe. You need write access to the 'Config', 'ReadFromTarget' and 'UpdateRecipe' symbols of the recipe management domain for this
localizedText.Popup_Text_ConfirmActivate:
Are you sure you want to activate this recipe?
This will write all variables contained in the recipe to the PLC.
localizedText.Popup_Text_ConfirmTeach:
Are you sure you want to teach this recipe?
This will overwrite all recipe variables with the current values from the PLC.
